program.title: AI-Ready Sourcer Program
program.subtitle: 8 weeks from task-doer to outcome-owner
program.description: A structured program that produces behavior change and reusable assets. Each week builds on the last. By the end, every participant can diagnose what matters, design a plan, execute with AI, verify with evidence, and influence hiring managers with confidence.

weeks.title: Baseline + Non-negotiables
weeks.outcome: Everyone understands the new definition of quality.
weeks.focus: Introduce 5 Quality Proof Points that apply to every market: Motivation (why this role, why now), Location reality (onsite/relocation constraints), Compensation range reality, Notice period/availability, Evidence snippet (proof they did the thing).
weeks.howToRun: Show two candidate examples: one who 'looks great' but fails (no evidence), and one who is 'evidence-based' and wins. Teach the principle: AI can draft, humans must verify.
weeks.deliverable: Team agrees on a one-page 'What Good Looks Like' standard.
exercises: Compare two candidate profiles and identify which has real evidence vs surface impressions
Write down your team's current definition of quality — then compare with the 5 Proof Points
Pick one recent submission and retroactively score it against the 5 Proof Points

weeks.title: Prompting for Outcomes
weeks.outcome: Everyone can use AI to produce decisions, not paragraphs.
weeks.focus: Teach 3 prompt types only: Intake Clarifier (turn messy req into crisp requirements), Persona Builder (who is the target + what signals matter), Outreach Angle Generator (3 angles + why they work).
weeks.howToRun: Live-build one persona together for a real role. Everyone copies and adapts it for their own role.
weeks.deliverable: Role Persona Card template added to the Asset Library.
exercises: Take a current open role and run it through the Intake Clarifier prompt
Build a Persona Card for your most challenging open role
Generate 3 outreach angles and explain which you'd use first and why

weeks.title: AI Sourcing: From Boolean to Strategy
weeks.outcome: AI is used to expand reach intelligently, not spam.
weeks.focus: Use AI to produce: 4 sourcing lanes (companies, titles, adjacent industries, geography), 'Must-have evidence' list (what proof you need to see), Boolean + alternative searches without being dependent on boolean alone.
weeks.howToRun: 30-minute sprint: each person builds 1 sourcing plan — not a search string, but a full plan.
weeks.deliverable: Sourcing Plan One-Pager template in the Asset Library.
exercises: Build a 4-lane sourcing strategy for your top priority role
Create a must-have evidence checklist that you can use during profile review
Generate Boolean strings in strict, balanced, and broad variants for one role

weeks.title: The Pre-HM Truth Check
weeks.outcome: You reduce late-stage failure from AI-polished CVs, inflated resumes, and misalignment.
weeks.focus: Implement a standard 10-12 minute check: 3 evidence questions (tell me about a time you did X — what was the measurable output?), 1 constraint reality question (location/availability/comp), 1 motivation question (why change now).
weeks.howToRun: Role-play: one person is the candidate, one is the sourcer, one is the evaluator. Calibrate scoring together (Strong/OK/Risk).
weeks.deliverable: Truth Check Script + Rubric added to the Asset Library.
exercises: Run 3 practice Truth Checks with teammates role-playing as candidates
Score the same candidate independently, then compare — calibrate where you differ
Identify one question in your current process that produces zero useful signal — replace it

weeks.title: Shortlist Writing: The Confidence Pack
weeks.outcome: Hiring managers trust you more because your shortlists are decisive.
weeks.focus: Every shortlist submission must include: 3 match reasons (with evidence), 1 risk identified, mitigation plan for the risk, recommended next step.
weeks.howToRun: Convert 2 existing candidates into Confidence Packs live as a group. Compare with how they would have been submitted before.
weeks.deliverable: Confidence Pack format added to the Asset Library.
exercises: Convert your most recent submission into a Confidence Pack format
Ask a hiring manager to compare a traditional CV forward vs a Confidence Pack — note their reaction
Identify the most common risk you see in candidates for your roles — write a standard mitigation for it

weeks.title: AI for Ops Acceleration
weeks.outcome: Team removes busywork and makes flow smoother without losing quality.
weeks.focus: Pick 2 automations from: Automated follow-up sequences, Candidate summary cards, HM update drafts, Interview prep packs, Data hygiene checks for trackers.
weeks.howToRun: Everyone chooses ONE workflow they hate. Work with AI to rewrite it into a standard template or automation.
weeks.deliverable: 1 automation per person contributed to the Asset Library.
exercises: List your top 3 most repetitive tasks — rank by time wasted per week
Pick the worst one and write an AI prompt that handles 80% of it
Create a standard template that your whole team can use for that workflow

weeks.title: Coaching: From 'Do This' to 'Think Like This'
weeks.outcome: You build leaders, not doers. Each person can explain decisions, challenge requirements, and propose trade-offs.
weeks.focus: Train on: Explaining a decision with evidence, Challenging a req politely and constructively, Proposing trade-offs when constraints conflict.
weeks.howToRun: Trade-off drills: You give constraints (limited budget, tight timeline, scarce market); they propose a strategy shift with rationale.
weeks.deliverable: Trade-off Playbook for common patterns added to the Asset Library.
exercises: Practice explaining a 'pass' decision to an HM using only evidence — no opinions
Take a current req that feels unrealistic — write a trade-off proposal with 3 options
Role-play a conversation where you push back on a hiring manager's unrealistic timeline

weeks.title: Certification + Showcase
weeks.outcome: Adoption becomes identity and pride. The team has proof of capability.
weeks.focus: Each person must demonstrate: one persona card created, one sourcing plan completed, one truth check conducted, one confidence pack sent to HM, one AI asset contributed to the Hub.
weeks.howToRun: Each person presents their best work. The team reviews and celebrates. Certifications awarded.
weeks.deliverable: AI-Ready Sourcer Badge (internal) + team showcase page.
exercises: Compile your portfolio of 5 required deliverables
Present your best piece of work to the team — explain the impact
Write a one-paragraph reflection: what changed in how you work over 8 weeks
